title: Which is better, Google Home or Google Nest Mini? - Quora
tags: Google Acquisition of Nest Labs for $3.2B (January 2014)

response.answer_text: The Google Home is the original Assistant, and it's still a great smart speaker. With excellent sound quality and generous amounts of bass, plus intuitive touch controls, sensitive microphones and a minimalist look. The Home Mini is the entry point to Google's smart speaker lineup, and it's as fun to use as ever. The news, or get Assistant to control smart home.

My experience you can use Google Nest Mini because this is latest and very feturistic device. my old google home mini sometimes not working i recently won Google Nest mini on telegram from club factory channel so i recived recently and this product was amazing.
